official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the maritime construction differential subsidy for fiscal year 1985, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to the Department of Transportation for FY 1985 for construction-differential subsidies under the Merchant Marine Act, 1936. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to approve and pay a subsidy which exceeds 50 percent of the cost of constructing, reconstructing, or reconditioning a vessel.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the maritime construction differential subsidy for fiscal year 1985, and for other purposes.
